Too Bee or not to bee?

Just what bees do when the hive grows. Part of them leave, breed a new queen and start a new hive. A swarm of bees is a GOOD sign that the bees are doing well. And with the collapse of bee colonies (colony collapse disorder) the past years, that's good news. Without bees you wouldn't have a lot of your favorite foods.
